adsouza.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • adsouza.shapes.Shape
      • adsouza.shapes.Shape2D
        • adsouza.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape2D
    This class represents a simple Rectangle. It can perform common calculations regarding the rectangles attributes and can draw a delineation of a Rectangle to Processing PApplet
    Version:
    10/26/2018
    Author:
    D'Souza

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a default Rectangle object with all dimensions and properties set to zero.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a custom, Rectangle object with the specified dimensions with top and bottom edges y and y+height.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height, int r, int g, int b)
      Creates a custom, Rectangle object with the specified dimensions with top and bottom edges y and y+height.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a default Rectangle object with all dimensions and properties set to zero.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 int r,
                 int g,
                 int b)
        Creates a custom, Rectangle object with the specified dimensions with top and bottom edges y and y+height. The left and right edges are at x and x+width respectively.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - is the y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - is the width of the rectangle
        height - is the height of the rectangle
        r - is the amount of Red color the rectangle will be filled with
        g - is the amount of Green color the rectangle will be filled with
        b - is the amount of Blue color the rectangle will be filled with

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a custom, Rectangle object with the specified dimensions with top and bottom edges y and y+height. The left and right edges are at x and x+width respectively.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        y - is the y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle
        width - is the width of the rectangle
        height - is the height of the rectangle

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Checks whether x and y are located inside this rectangle
        Specified by:
        isPointInside in class Shape
        Parameters:
        x - is the x-coordinate of the point to check
        y - is the y-coordinate of the point to check
        Returns:
        true if the point (x, y) is inside this rectangle, false otherwiseww

        Overrides:

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rectangle other)
        Checks and returns whether Rectangle other intersects this rectangle
        Parameters:
        other - Rectangle object that is used to check for intersection with this Rectangle object
        Returns:
        the method will return true is this Rectangle object overlaps on the other Rectangle object or false otherwise

      • checkDiagonal

        public boolean checkDiagonal(Rectangle other)
        Calculate and checks for equality between the diagonals of two Rectangle objects
        Parameters:
        other - Rectangle object that is used to check for intersection with this Rectangle object
        Returns:
        the method will return true if this Rectangle object's diagonal is equal to the diagonal of the otherRectangle object or false otherwise
